Description

Framed series of photographs. The individual photographs are shown through oval openings, with the information under each photograph. The dedication is in the central oval, in fancy writing using upper and lower case lettering.

Inscription

SCREMERSTON MEN/ WHO/ FOUGHT AND DIED/ IN/ THE GREAT WAR/ 1914 - 1918/ (NAMES)/ "THEY DIED TO RESCUE OTHER LANDS/ AND KEEP OUR HOMES SECURE"

Inscription legible?

yes
